text: The Zomi Baptist Church is a christian believer church. In India the Zomi Baptist Church (ZBC) was established in 1982. The ZBC headquarters is at Champhai, India. In Myanmar the ZBC is known as ZBCM (Zomi Baptist Church in Myanmar). Nowadays the ZBC is also present in the United States (Tulsa) and other countries in the world. ==References== Category:Baptist churches Category:Christianity in the United States Category:1982 establishments in Asia Category:1980s establishments in India Category:Organizations based in India Category:Organizations based in Myanmar Category:Churches in India
title: Zomi Baptist Church
